CustomField.description: Uplift (Amt) is measured as a currency amount. This is a system-calculated field, as Uplift can only be applied to MDQ segments in percent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Uplift (Amt) is measured as a currency amount. This is a system-calculated field, as Uplift can only be applied to MDQ segments in percent.
CustomField.label: Uplift (Amt)
